column1: Judicial Officers of Labour Tribunal. All three applications are now supported together seeking the
issue of formal notice and interim relief.
On 12th May 2023, 05th June 2023 and on 04th July 2023 Dr. Romesh De Silva President’s Counsel
appearing for the petitioners of the first two cases and President’s Counsel Shamil Perera for the
third application   supported the matter and learned Deputy Solicitor-General strongly objected
to issuing formal notices on the respondents.
